Blog.post: Yup, it's me again. Sorry, didn't continue yesterday. Felt quite tired and irriated so didn't write. Anyway, day was quite good. Dunno why kinda miss my friends although I just saw them yesterday. Mayb I'm going mad soon? Haha,anyway, went out in the morning today. Didn't go for cca had important things to do. Don't mind okie? I write song lyrics. Not really write lah, more like copy and paste. Haha, really like this song. *smiles* ~Broken~ *Seether and amy lee* I wanted you to know, I love the way you laugh I want to hold you high, and steal your pain away I keep your photograph, and I know it serves me well I want to hold you high, and steal your pain. 'Coz I'm broken, when I'm lonesome And I don't feel right when you're gone away. You gotta win, you don't feel me anymore. The worst is over now, and we can breathe again I wanna hold you high, and steal my pain away There is so much left to learn, and no one left to fight I wanna hold you high, and steal your pain. 'Coz Im broken, when I'm open And I feel like that I'm strong enough 'Coz I'm broken, when I'm lonesome And I don't feel right when you're gone away. 'Coz I'm broken, when I'm openAnd I don't feel like that I'm strong enough 'Coz I'm broken, when I'm lonesome And I don't feel right when you're gone away. 'Coz I'm broken, when I'm lonesome And I don't feel right when you're gone away. 'Coz I'm broken, when I'm lonesome And I don't feel right when you're gone. You gotta win, you don't feel me anymore.

Hey! It's me again. Feeling rather sad and tired today. Dunno why. Yup, seems like nothing seems to make me happy at all. I try to laugh in school but deep inside I know that what I'm doing is just on the surface. sigh* I suspect I'm suffering from depression. Haha! LOL. History was quite ok today, probably the most fun and interesting lesson today. Maths was kinda ok, we did group work. Oh yah, she tried to act smart today. So irriating, like so fussy about every single thing. Freak lah. Opps, phone ringing. Write later.

Hey! It's me again. This stupid girl made president of our class so angry today. Idiot, think she so damm freeking cool can? My ass. Probably like what Mat said must look at mirror, maybe when she look the mirror will crack. Haha!! Followed Li Ting to doctor today, if you have to know she's another girl not me. In the clinic she was squeezing my hand til it almost lost blood? Haha kiding. School was damm fun today. Mat and I were thinking of a name for "her". So during physics we were listing all her bad points. When I do think of a name then I tell you again k? Yup, had a good day. Really happy that our class was so united today. 3E you rock. Ok, need to go. Write again soon. Bye! *hugs and kisses* Li Ting

Hey!!Hey! It's me again. Really gave up on my diary at diaryland. sigh*Anyway, day was like what boring+tired+sick+sian. Haha!! Yup. Lit was fun, I passed my lit paper. phew. I don't know why I'm describing my day. Haha!! Haiyah, what busy weeks I have had so far. OMG, had like what plies and plies of work to do. Projects, CTs and homework. All roled into one. Sorry, lah if yu thought this entry was short. Really tired and had a really long day. Sorry, write again soon. Bye!! *hugs and kisses* Li Ting

Hey!Hey. I had to change my diary again to blogger. sigh*This is like probably the third time I'm changing it. cos my diary at diaryland got problem so no choice had to change. Never mind, I shall just start all over again. Anyway, we got back our english paper. Not bad I passed. Day was boring boring. Had to do quite a lot of things, projects deadline coming soon and I haven finished anyone yet. AHHHH!!! This is probably the shortest entry I've ever written. So, sorry got nothing much for you to read. I'll add something later k? Bye *hugs and kisses* Li Ting

"I am the person who sit snext to you in class" "I am the person who is a bit overweight " "I am the preson who is laughed at because I am short" "I am the person who is picked on because I like computers" "I am the person who talks with an accent" "I am the person who isn't great at gym" " I am the person who is always to blame" " I am the person who takes the bus home in fear" " I am the person who stumbles when I walk too fast" " But I am also the person who is brave enough to wake up and do it all again the next day" Nigel Potts Hey, read the short story that is above? Good, cos I took it from a book. The story shows that whatever hardships we may face in school. Whether it may be bullying, friendship problems, results whatever. If we can wake up everyday and face all the problems , then there's nothing we can't do. Yup, great huh? Yah, was reading last night, then read about this part and found it quite true. Especially the part " But I am also the person who is brave enough to wake up and do it all again the next day". Wow, that hit me like what, so I wrote or rather typed it down to share it with you. Ok, let's see, day was kinda busy yesterday. Work to be done, projects not completed etc.etc.. I have to go out later to but some school stuff, ALONE. sigh* never mind lah, used to it . But not really decided if I should go 'cos the school stuff also not that important. Yah, oops, I need to go. I'll continue later. see yah. *hugs and kisses* Li Ting +fly up high and leave the world behind*

Heeys!!I'm back again. Finally, my blogspot is working, cos just now the music wasn't playing and the tag board just " disappeared". But then now, it's working again. Good,good. Yup, if not I have to redo every little thinky again. sigh* Yah, I'm writing my second entry today again. Not sure what to write. Let's see, hmmm.. don't think I'm going to church tomorrow. Not sure, can't contact Regina. Dunno where she go. Yah, need to get a white and black shirt, not sure when I'm going to get it cos I need it soon. *sigh Come to think of it, I dunno what to write now. *haiyah, maybe I should intro myself again. Ok, here we go. The girl +me *15 *coded 07 *In the best class in the whole of sec 3s= Sec 3 Endurance *sjcian * 22061989 hint hint +loves___________________* *pink,blue,yellow,orange,black,white *chocolates and sweets *playing basketball *roller blading *watching kites fly way up high in the shy *shiny and glittery stars which twinkle so bright *puppies and kittens *friends, classmates * my coolest, super-duper, funkilicious "family" * suntanning *playing and having loads of fun *catching frisbees. +dislikes____________________* *Maths *studying *ppl who don't do anything but complain alot *bossy ppl +song______________________* I'm not a perfect person There's many things I wish I didn't do But I continue learning I never meant to do those things to you And so I have to say before I go That I just want you to know I've found a reason for me To change who I used to be A reason to start over new &the reason is you I'm sorry that I hurt you It's something I must live with everyday And all the pain I put you through I wish that I could take it all away And be the one who catches all your tears Thats why i need you to hear I've found a reason for me To change who I used to be A reason to start over new&the reason is You [x4] I'm not a perfect person I never meant to do those things to you And so I have to say before I go That I just want you to know I've found a reason for me To change who I used to be A reason to start over new&the reason is you I've found a reason to show A side of me you didn't know A reason for all that I do And the reason is you ~stop my pain__________________* *hugs and kisses* Li Ting +soar into the sky+

Hey! Whew, what a long day it was yesterday. Friday the 13th somemore. *sigh* Luckily, my projects are done. If not, i'll be like my friends rushing my work even until now. But I finished of course got sacifice lah.Slept very late,then went to school the next day feeling very tired and restless. sigh* Many things happen yesterday. Bad day, got scolded by ppl for nothing. Seems like all sec 3s in a bad mood. Probably because of projects, not enough sleep. That's why. After school, also like everyone rush to the school comp lab to do finish their work. Evryone was like " quick, quick 3 o'clock ready". Yah, bev, rice and I were just going around to see who needed help. So good right? Went to school today, really busy. Had to stick the tags on the OHPs, other than that Sharon pusjed her share of her work to me,'cos she had to go and pass up her projects. Ok lah, then I got no choice must do. So, besides sticking, I had to do stock taking. Making sure that the OHPs were the correct ones. OMG, there were like what 10 of them of I slowly do, then after that. Stupid Amanda had to ask me and Wendilynn to push back . Luckily, Mrs Goh say they must push. Not us. Freak lah. Sometimes I feel that I don't really like amanda alot. Yup, now doing chinese project. Finishing soon, later must call them up. Ask if must do reflection. Yah, wish me luck. Ok, I have to go. See you soon,take care. Bye!! *hugs and kisses* Li Ting ~happy memories+

AHHHHHH!!!!Absotely going insane soon. So much work to do, projects and I'm like rushing them now. Stupid comp like going to crash any minute. Freak lah! All the work not done yet and stupid Debra tan wants us to present Leda and the swan tomorrow, ask her to go bang wall lah. Don't care if cannot finish my projects tonight don't do the stupid presentation. Idiot lah, but luckily got friends helping me to do the project. *phew* thank gosh they are around if not I dunno what to do, probably go kill myself or something. No lah just kidding. Let's see, day was quite ok. Finally scored quite high for my maths class test.Didn't pass lah but first time I get so high. So quite happy. Hee. Lit was rather fun. Beatric, charlotte and I were playing Bingo. Stupid rice won like what 9 times I only won ONCE .Once ok, how pathetic right. Nvm, next time must win her. Haha. Ok, think need to go and rush my work. Wish me luck. Bye. *hugs and kisses* Li Ting ~You rock my world*

Hey, I'm back again. Just went to friendster and checked out the bulletin bored. Saw this really very sad story, so I thought I shared it with you. As I sat there in English class, I stared atthe girl next to me. She was my so called "bestfriend". I stared at her long, silky hair, andwished she was mine. But she didn't notice me like that, and I knew it. After class, she walked up to me and asked me for the notes she had missed the day before and handed them toher. She said "thanks" and gave me a kiss on thecheek. I wanted to tell her, I want her to knowthat I don't want to be just friends, I love herbut I'm just too shy, and I don't know why. 11th grade The phone rang. On the other end, it was her. She was in tears, mumbling on and on about how her love had broke her heart . She asked me tocome over because she didn't want to be alone,so I did. As I sat next to her on the sofa, Istared at her soft eyes, wishing she was mine. After 2 hours, one Drew Barrymore movie, andthree bags of chips, she decided to go to sleep. She looked at me, said "thanks" and gave me akiss on the cheek. I want to tell her, I want her to know that I don't want to be justfriends, I love her but I'm just too shy, and Idon't know why. Senior year The day before prom she walked to my locker. "Mydate is sick" she said; he's not going to gowell, I didn't have a date, and in 7th grade, wemade a promise that if neither of us had dates, we would go together just as "best friends". Sowe did. Prom night, after everything was over, Iwas standing at her front door step! I stared ather as she smiled at me and stared at me with her crystal eyes. I want her to be mine, but shei sn't think of me like that, and I know it. Then she said "I had the best time, thanks!" and gaveme a kiss on the cheek. I want to tell her, I want her to know that I don't want to be just friends, I love her but I'm just too shy, and Idon't know why. Graduation Day A day passed, then a week, then a month. BeforeI could blink, it was graduation day. I watchedas her perfect body floated like an angel up onstage to get her diploma. I wanted her to be mine, but she didn't noticeme like that, and I knew it. Before everyonewent home, she came to me in her smock and hat ,and cried as I hugged her .Then she lifted her head from my shoulder andsaid, "you're my best friend, thanks" and gaveme a kiss on the cheek. I want to tell her, Iwant her to know that I don't want to be justfriends, I love her but I'm just too shy, and I don't know why. A Few Years Later Now I sit in the pews of the church. That girl is getting married now. I watched her say "I do" and drive off to her new life, married toanother man. I wanted her to be mine, but she didn`t see me like that, and I knewit. But before she drove away, she came to me and said "you came!". She said "thanks" and kissed me on the cheek. I want to tell her, I want her to know that I don't want to be just friends, I love her but I'm just tooshy, and I don't know why. Funeral Years passed, I looked down at the coffin of a girl who used to be my "best friend". At the service, they read a diary entry she hadwrote in her high school years. This is what it read: "I stare at him wishing he was mine, but he doesn't notice me like that ,and I know it .I want to tell him ,I want him to know that I don't want to be justfriends, I love himbut I'm just too shy, and I don't know why. I wish he would tell me he loved me! I wish I did too... I thought to my self, and I cried. I Love U I Love U I Love U..." Remember to tell the person you like how you feel. I know it's hard but you need to. Don't be like the girl in the story. *hugs abd kisses* Li Ting ~you rock my world*

AHHHH!! I'm going mad soon. Projects all not done and have to be handed in on Fridae. Someone kill me. AHH!! Now, trying to rush my history, see ca finish not? sigh* haiyah, quickly finish this and don't have to worry about it anymore. Anyway, kinda angry at this stupid freaking b****.I tell you what happen ok? Went out with her, then dunn ois it I bad mood or what lah but everything she does or says just pisses me off. Ok, never mind I bear with it. Then, she opened her mouth and said this " don't even know why I came today " Wah lao eh, you think I want you to come is it? F*** you lah, I also got no choice one can? Idiot, you think I want you to come is it? Bloody Bitch . K, need to go and do the project now, wish me luck. Ok? Just thought I came to say Hi. Now, need to go, bye. *hugs and kisses* Li Ting ~you rock my world*

Hi! I'm back again. Day was kinda fun and quite ok lah actually. Normal subjects with normal lessions. Haiyah, nvm must look at bright side, tomorrow half day then holiday for 5 days? YAY!! WHEE!. Yah, but during the 5 days, busy busy busy have like what thousands of work to do. So tired, sigh*. Tell you something, today we had a toliet marathon. during physics and pc, everyone just kept going to the toilet after someone else came back. Haha, that was so cool, not really cool lah but then what other word can I find? Ok, it's time for song. Enjoy your holidays everyone. hee. ~Echo* Trapt [Chorus:]Close my eyes Let the whole thing pass me by There is no time To waste asking why I'll run away with you by my side I'll run away with you by my side I need to let go, let go, let go, let go of this pride ,(Asking why) I think about your face And how I fall into your eyes The outline that I trace Around the one that I call mine Time that called for space Unclear where you drew the line I don't need to solve this case And I don't need to look behind [Chorus] Do I expect to change, the past I hold inside,with all the words I say,repeating over in my mind,somethings you can't erase, no matter how hard you try ,an exit to escape is all there is left to find. Close my eyes Let the whole thing pass me by There is no time To waste asking whyI'll run away with you by my side I'll run away with you by my sideI need to let go, let go, let go, let go of this pride, Until this echo, echo, echo, echo in my mind Until this echo, echo, echo, echo can subside(I know I always loved you) (I know I always loved you)(I know I always loved you) So I close my eyesLet the whole thing pass me by There is no timeTo waste asking why I'll run away with you by my side I'll run away with you by my sideI need to let go, let go, let go, let go of this pride, Until this echo, echo, echo, echo in my mind Until this echo, echo, echo, echo can subside
